etymologies: Middle English: from dote(so named because it is easily caught) + -rel. Compare with dodo

definitions: a small plover with a brown streaked back and a chestnut or buff belly with black below. Dotterels breed in mountainous areas and in the tundra.

notes.text: Genus Eudromias, family Charadriidae: two species, especially the Eurasian E. morinellus, which is noted for its tameness

shortDefinitions: small plover with brown streaked back and chestnut or buff belly with black below, breeding in mountainous areas
